Standalone Trees¶

A standalone tree is a working tree with an associated repository. It is an independently usable branch, with no dependencies on any other. Creating a standalone tree (via brz init) is the quickest way to put an existing project under version control.

Related Commands:

init    Make a directory into a versioned branch.
